name: Rosa Luxemburg Stiftung Brussels Office
memberOrga:
Brussels Office http://www.rosalux.eu/
Liaison Office Madrid
goal:
The Rosa Luxemburg Stiftung is a political education organisation that:

• generates and disseminates knowledge about social relations in a globalized and unjust world
• provides a venue for critical analysis of current capitalism
• acts as a hub for programmatic discussions about modern democratic socialism and as a socialist think-tank for political alternatives
• supports dialogue between leftist/socialist forces, movements, intellectuals and non-governmental organisations
• promotes the socio-ecological transformation of global society based on solidarity and emancipation

It stands within the tradition of the workers' and women's movements, as well as anti-fascism and anti-racism.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Trade, Youth
